headline.main: ITALIANS ARREST AMERICAN RECTOR; Only U.S. Protestant Pastor in Rome Detained on Eve of Thanksgiving Service EMBASSY OFFICIAL ACTS Clergyman From New York State Held on Suspicion of Intelligence Activity

lead_paragraph: ROME, Nov. 18 -- The Rev. Hiram Gruber Woolf of Elmira, N.Y., rector of St. Paul's American (Episcopal) Church, was arrested thin morning by two police agents and is being held incomunicado in an unnamed prison on suspicion of intelligence activity.
abstract: Rev H G Woolf, St Paul's P E Ch (Rome, Italy) rector, held by Ital authorities on intelligence activity charge
